info.official_title: Efficacy and Safety of the Combination of Gemcitabine, Oxaliplatin, Sintilimab and Bevacizumab in Initially Unresectable Biliary Tract Cancer

identified_line.line: 1. Age ≥18 and ≤80 years;
2. ECOG 0~1;
3. Histologically or cytologically confirmed carcinoma of the bile duct or gallbladder;

criterions.exact_snippets: Histologically or cytologically confirmed carcinoma of the bile duct
Histologically or cytologically confirmed carcinoma of the ... gallbladder

or_criteria.exact_snippets: Histologically or cytologically confirmed carcinoma of the bile duct
Histologically or cytologically confirmed carcinoma of the ... gallbladder

identified_line.line: 4. Imaging assessment of disease stage III/IVA/any TN1M0*;

criterions.exact_snippets: Imaging assessment of disease stage III/IVA/any TN1M0

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Imaging assessment of disease stage III/IVA/any TN1M0

identified_line.line: 5. The main organs have good functions and the examination indexes meet the following requirements:

criterions.exact_snippets: The main organs have good functions

and_criteria.exact_snippets: The main organs have good functions

identified_line.line: 6. Blood routine test:
Hemoglobin ≥90 g/L (no blood transfusion within 14 days); Neutrophils count ≥1.5×10^9/L; Platelet count ≥80×10^9/L;

criterions.exact_snippets: Hemoglobin ≥90 g/L (no blood transfusion within 14 days)
Hemoglobin ≥90 g/L (no blood transfusion within 14 days)

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Hemoglobin ≥90 g/L (no blood transfusion within 14 days)
Hemoglobin ≥90 g/L (no blood transfusion within 14 days)

identified_line.line: 7. Biochemical tests:

Total bilirubin ≤2×ULN (upper limit of normal value); Blood alanine aminotransferase (ALT) or blood aspartate aminotransferase (AST) ≤ 2.5×ULN; Endogenous creatinine clearance rate ≥ 50 mL /min (Cockcroft-Gault formula);

criterions.exact_snippets: Endogenous creatinine clearance rate ≥ 50 mL /min (Cockcroft-Gault formula)

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Endogenous creatinine clearance rate ≥ 50 mL /min (Cockcroft-Gault formula)

identified_line.line: 8. Voluntarily signed the informed consent;
9. Good compliance and family members are willing to cooperate with follow-up.

criterions.exact_snippets: family members are willing to cooperate with follow-up

and_criteria.exact_snippets: family members are willing to cooperate with follow-up

identified_line.line: Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 80 Years
1. Other uncured malignancies;
3. Previous anti-tumor therapy for the disease in this study;

criterions.exact_snippets: Previous anti-tumor therapy for the disease

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Previous anti-tumor therapy for the disease

identified_line.line: 4. Participated in other drug clinical trials within one month;

criterions.exact_snippets: Participated in other drug clinical trials within one month
criterions.criterion: participation in other drug clinical trials

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Participated in other drug clinical trials within one month
and_criteria.criterion: participation in other drug clinical trials

identified_line.line: 5. Patients with known history of other systemic serious diseases before screening;

criterions.exact_snippets: known history of other systemic serious diseases

and_criteria.exact_snippets: known history of other systemic serious diseases

identified_line.line: 6. Long-term unhealed wounds or incomplete healed fractures;
7. Have a history of organ transplantation;

8. Abnormal blood coagulation, with bleeding tendency (14 days before randomization must meet: INR within the normal range without the use of anticoagulants); Patients treated with anticoagulants or vitamin K antagonists such as warfarin, heparin or their analogs; The use of low-dose warfarin (1 mg orally, once daily) or low-dose aspirin (not more than 100 mg daily) for prophylactic purposes is permitted, provided that INR is less than 1.5;

criterions.exact_snippets: Abnormal blood coagulation, with bleeding tendency
Abnormal blood coagulation, with bleeding tendency
INR within the normal range without the use of anticoagulants
INR within the normal range without the use of anticoagulants
Patients treated with anticoagulants or vitamin K antagonists such as warfarin, heparin or their analogs
criterions.criterion: anticoagulant or vitamin K antagonist treatment

criterions.exact_snippets: The use of low-dose warfarin (1 mg orally, once daily) or low-dose aspirin (not more than 100 mg daily) for prophylactic purposes is permitted, provided that INR is less than 1.5
The use of low-dose warfarin (1 mg orally, once daily) or low-dose aspirin (not more than 100 mg daily) for prophylactic purposes is permitted, provided that INR is less than 1.5

and_criteria.exact_snippets: Abnormal blood coagulation, with bleeding tendency
Abnormal blood coagulation, with bleeding tendency

The use of low-dose warfarin (1 mg orally, once daily) or low-dose aspirin (not more than 100 mg daily) for prophylactic purposes is permitted, provided that INR is less than 1.5

identified_line.line: 9. The incidence of arterial/venous thrombosis events in the previous year, such as cerebrovascular accident (including temporary ischemic attack), deep venous thrombosis and pulmonary embolism, was screened;

criterions.exact_snippets: incidence of arterial/venous thrombosis events in the previous year

and_criteria.exact_snippets: incidence of arterial/venous thrombosis events in the previous year
incidence of arterial/venous thrombosis events in the previous year
incidence of arterial/venous thrombosis events in the previous year

identified_line.line: 2. Pregnant or lactating women, if the subject becomes pregnant during the study period, should withdraw from the clinical trial;

and_criteria.exact_snippets: if the subject becomes pregnant during the study period

identified_line.line: 10. People with a history of psychotropic substance abuse and unable to get rid of it or with mental disorders; Have a history of immunodeficiency, or other acquired or congenital immunodeficiency diseases, or have a history of organ transplantation;

criterions.exact_snippets: unable to get rid of it

identified_line.line: 12. Concomitant diseases that, in the Investigator's judgment, seriously endanger patient safety or affect patient completion of the study.

criterions.exact_snippets: Concomitant diseases ... seriously endanger patient safety
Concomitant diseases ... affect patient completion of the study
